sentences: Radistid olid keskuses ööpäev läbi kuuldel.
..radist kontrollis käigu pealt sidet: "Siin Viljandi, siin Viljandi ... kuuldele..."
context: The word 'kuuldel' is the adessive and allative case form of the Estonian verb 'kuule' (to hear/to listen). It appears in two main contexts: 1) As an adverbial expression meaning 'hearing' or 'listening to', as seen in the example where radio operators were hearing throughout the day; 2) As a compound word component, like in 'kuuldekaugus' (audibility range/distance of hearing), where it forms part of compound nouns related to auditory perception.
